A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Where were the lore masters when approving this script ??? With a franchise as big as Starwars\, you better believe that true fans care about the plot and overall consistency. If I were to pick one of the many problems with this story and film\, it would be the direction they took Luke. His resolve he had at the end of Return of the Jedi\, I really don't see him trying to kill Ben out of fear. Where are the Starwars lore masters who really know the story? To be fair to the rising stars ie Daisy and John excellent acting. Impeccable acting from Mark Hamil also. I'd say less comedy more serious themes and base a new story off of the foundation that previous episodes already laid. Otherwise it's just not consistent.
